definition: (lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: The drifting people of Baekje are precisely produces under this historical perspective.
sentences.chinese: 百濟遺民正是在此歷史背景下出現的。

sentences.english: The second chapter elaborates the Baekje drifting people related to the historical background.
sentences.chinese: 第二章論述百濟遺民相關的歷史背景。

sentences.english: Zhou Rong was a brilliant essay writer of early Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 周容散文具有鮮明的時代特色，是清初的遺民心史。

sentences.english: This chapter also describes the integration of the situation of Baekje drifting people in the Tang Dynasty and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 本章還闡述了百濟遺民在唐朝和日本的融合狀況。

sentences.english: Edom's remnant was absorbed with the Jews during the period of the Maccabees .
sentences.chinese: 以東的遺民在馬加比時期納入猶太人之內。

sentences.english: Chapter IV focuses primarily on the inflow of Baekje drifting people against the resettlement policies.
sentences.chinese: 第四章主要闡述了各流入地對百濟遺民的安置政策。

sentences.english: The conclusion part summarized Guizhuang in Ming adherent literature status and the value.
sentences.chinese: 結語部分總結了歸莊在明遺民文學中的地位和價值。

sentences.english: The site belonging to the late Taosi culture is the dwelling village of Youtao descendent tribe.
sentences.chinese: 陶寺晚期文化偏晚階段遺址爲有唐氏遺民所居的村落。

sentences.english: A huge number of Baekje drifting people come into different areas.
sentences.chinese: 數量龐大的百濟遺民產生後，流入不同區域。

sentences.english: Ming Dynasty the large number of adherents, those before who can not.
sentences.chinese: 明遺民人數衆多，是之前各朝遺民不能及者。

sentences.english: Ming Dynasty the large number of adherents, those before who can not.
sentences.chinese: 明遺民人數衆多，是之前各朝遺民不能及者。

definition: to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
Zanhuang county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
Zhao, one of the seven states during the Warring States Period of Chinese history (475-220 BC)

Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
Yugan county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
